株.definition: tree trunk; stump (tree root); a plant; classifier for trees or plants; strain (biology); to involve others (in shady business)

株守.definition: to stick to sth stubbornly; never let go

株式會社.definition: Japanese limited company; corporation; public company; Ltd; p.l.c.; Corp; Japanese pr. kabushiki-gaisha

株治.definition: to involve others (in a law case)

株洲市.definition: Zhuzhou, prefecture-level city in Hunan Province 湖南省[Hu2nan2 Sheng3]

株距.definition: spacing; distance between plants (within a row)

株連.definition: to involve others (in a crime); guilt by association
